metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25434 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
libtiff 4.5.0 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow via extractContigSamplesBytes() at /libtiff/tools/tiffcrop.c:3215.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> vulnerability in the tiffcrop CLI tool ccdm94> the fix for this issue is the same as the one for CVE-2023-0795.

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10').
